spi_lcd.c File Reference

This file provides a set of functions needed to manage the communication between SPI peripheral and LCD. More...

#include "spi_lcd.h"
#include "font.h"

Go to the source code of this file.

Detailed Description

This file provides a set of functions needed to manage the communication between SPI peripheral and LCD.
